data.text: @AlexPutterman There are no “cases” because there is no virus https://t.co/awAkVQO7an
@ZdanysMD It looks like the New Haven graph is updated as of a couple weeks ago, but I'm sure @jordan_peccia can tell you more https://t.co/86D5MP1qjN
@AlexPutterman Is there an up-to-date wastewater tracking for CT?
@AlexPutterman Wait for the U shape rebound when the masks come off
@AlexPutterman You mean to mid-November levels when masks were required in schools?

@AlexPutterman An adequate day of testing in CT is 32,000 tests. We are not there. It’s flatlined. Can’t rely on these numbers only watch a trend. Which is down, for now. They found Alpha back in NYC this week. https://t.co/urrHvC4SSL
@AlexPutterman @AFTCT And yet there are districts that are 3X the CT rate. Who’s moving us?

@AlexPutterman Testing is down 60% over this time last year. Based on 7 day moving average. 
But that doesn’t effect “cases”😏
